column1: # The reading for July 1934 is shown as an estimate on the sheet and has been omitted.
# The readings for February and March 1947 are part-estimated for snow and have been retained.
# The readings for April and May 1952 are shown as estimates on the sheet and have been omitted.
# The reading for September 1953 is shown as an estimate on the sheet and has been omitted.
# The readings for January to March 1954 are shown as estimates on the sheet and have been omitted.
# The gauge moved from Sleights Hall to Hall Cottage in 1952. Hall Cottage has not been located but is presumably close to the Hall.
# The grid reference shown on the 1950s sheet seems to have a mistake in it - the northing part is a kilometre too far south.
